description.value: The assassin makes three attacks, one of which must be with a dagger. The assassin poisons a weapon as part of this multiattack.

Starting at 2nd level, your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Leather armor consists of either layers of leather or a single thick layer of leather. The leather is hardened, often by boiling it in oil or coating it in a hardening compound. This armor usually only covers the torso, and provides more mobility than heavier armor, making it the choice for most archers or warriors who depend more on dodging and fast movement than tougher armor.

Note: Assume that the assassin coats their shortsword with this poison as part of their first attack action. Each time you hit with this shortsword, use this ability on the same target as well (counting it as a single attack).

A creature hit by the poisoned weapon or ammunition must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 2d6 poison damage. Once applied, the poison retains potency for 1 minute before drying. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

activation.condition: one slashing or piercing weapon, or up to three pieces of ammunition

description.value:
Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit with an attack. This damage counts as part of the attack, and if you roll critical hit and use sneak attack, your sneak attack damage is doubled. To deal this extra damage, your weapon cannot be a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.lYS9gLJUyCp7cKzX]{Heavy} melee weapon, and you must meet one of the following criteria:

  • you have advantage on the attack roll against your target

  • your target is within 5 ft. of another creature hostile to them, and the other creature is not @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.svcJ1yGovpUs0jLJ]{Incapacitated}

Click @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.2w2vPEpcH9NLYdGH.JournalEntryPage.sGtCAuBlpH27ZjDs]{here} for an example (2).

Your Sneak Attack damage increases as you gain levels in this class, as shown in the Sneak Attack column of the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.RTS23KqJMFWlzLKd]{Rouge Progression Table}.

Shortswords can work as main hand or off-hand weapons, and are meant for stabbing attacks.

Properties:

&Reference[Finesse], &reference[light weapon]

A dagger is a short blade balanced both for thrusting and throwing. Daggers, as opposed to common knives, were made for combat. Many improvised weapons use the statistics of a dagger.

Properties:

&Reference[Finesse], &reference[light weapon], &Reference[Thrown]
